news_header: Argentine President Javier Milei has denied promoting the cryptocurrency $Libra, which collapsed shortly after he mentioned it. A judge will decide if he faces fraud charges.
news_original_title: Argentina's President Milei denies crypto fraud allegations
news_text: Milei claims he acted in good faith and compared investors to gamblers. His post drew criticism and was deleted after a few hours. The presidential office stated he was not involved in $Libra's development, and an investigation is underway. Opposition politicians threaten impeachment, but analysts doubt they will secure enough votes. Milei insists he has nothing to hide and that investors were aware of the risks.
